website_summaries.verdict: This insulated glass does a stellar job keeping beverages chilled for up to 9 hours and warm for 3, and is designed for convenience.
pros: Rubber bottom keeps cup in place and prevents it from tipping over
Lid conveniently closes completely to guard against spills
Designed with flat sides so that it is easy to hold
cons: Colors and patterns of cups may look different on Amazon than they do in real life

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this in the mail yesterday, but I was RIDICULOUSLY disappointed when I did. The color is not even close to the picture online. I was expecting a vibrant purple with lots of sparkle, and what I got was a dull lavender-ish with very little glitter. I absolutely love Corkcicle, and I have 6 other products from them. Quality wise it's a great brand and I'm sure that this cup would meet the same standards, but it's far from the bright, vibrant product I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: DBH

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a fake, returned
customer_reviews.text: I got the Aurora print because it looked beautiful in stores! The one I received looked like a cheap knock off, rough seams, flat color. compared side by side to my other. Immediately returned
customer_reviews.author: turnfrederick

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: How I use my Corkcicle wine cup: I use it for coffee in the morning & it keeps the whole cupful hot for a couple of hours! I sip slowly, so this saves me from having to nuke my mug over and over. In the afternoon I use it for tea. Same wonderful warmth & no nuking! In the evening I drink my ice cold cocktail in it. Then I fill with water and place on my nightstand for middle of the night sips. No spills! I hardly use any other cups, mugs, tumblers now that I have this Corckcicle!
customer_reviews.author: Read by Candelight

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a “bad batch”, all 4 leaked ALL over everything. I really really loved this brand.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these and they all leaked after the first use! Ruined my backpack and my friends chair cushion bc of he leakage. :(
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The perfect coffee cup
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect coffee cup to me - I don't love the huge tall ones, I like ones more the size of mugs or glasses, which this is and its double walled so it keeps my coffee warm for about 2 hours, which is how long it takes me to drink 8 oz. (I have little children, everything takes a long time) The bottom is grippy type material so it stays in place and the lid works pretty well when it gets knocked over (again, I have small children) The materials of the actual cup feels good in my hand and I like that its black. Its the only cup I use, in the house or out.
customer_reviews.author: Ajasyoga

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted my sister one of these and she wouldn't stop talking about how great it was. I had to order one for myself. She was not over exaggerating. This thing is amazing. It keeps beverages cold for long periods of time and i like that the lid slides closed to keep out bugs/prevent spills. Easy to stash in your bag when going to outdoor concerts or lounging by the pool. I will gift this to more people this coming holiday season!
customer_reviews.author: karnington

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold for hours!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Corkcicle's stemless glass in Aurora! I had purchased several of these glasses for the administrative staff at my office and decided that I wanted one for myself. The product appears leak proof and has a tight-fitting lid with a slide opening. The base of the product has a nonstick surface so it is extremely sturdy. It keeps liquids cold for hours! The shape of the product allows easy handling for an adult-size hand. I will continue to purchase these as gifts for my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Stains and looks horrible within a few weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for red wine. I got the yellow color and it gets your lipgloss/lipstick, fingerprints, wine marks and never comes clean. It ended up looking dirty and gross within a few weeks of purchase. Do not purchase if you want something that will last long. Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Is it safe??
customer_reviews.text: The paint is peeling off. What is the paint made out of? Is it safe to drink from the cups if the paint is peeling?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great visual design with flaws
customer_reviews.text: Love the colour, build quality and visual design of the stemless glass. Instead of marketing it as being 'perfect for wine' - it's not, who wants to drink a good wine out of a metal cup? - Corkcicle would have been better off improving the 'spill-less' cap design to make it truly spill-tight. As it is, it's best suited to keeping coffee warm in the short term and saving on plastic / paper cups from coffee stores, though you must be careful holding it as it has a tendency to leak.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Walnut Corkcickle stemless, insulated wine cup
customer_reviews.text: Love Corkcickle. Bought mine on vacation for wine and my husband wanted one. Got him the "walnut" one which he uses for coffee. We are both very happy with these. No leakages and keeps beverages the temperature they should be. One of our favorite features is that there are flat places on 2 "sides" that make gripping the cup much easier. I have tiny hands and my husband has huge bear paws. It was the flat sides that made him want the cup! The wood look is just as pictured. Very happy with these cups!
customer_reviews.author: KikiB

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid product
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product.. It's not a Yeti, but it's a good second. I purchased this product primarily because this product comes with a lid. For outdoor events or by the pool it's durable and has a lid, which unfortunately, it's Yeti counterpart does not. I do wish the lid was a little bit better made but that said it's good product.
customer_reviews.author: ap

customer_reviews.title: Drop the stem!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, drop the stem.....these make the very best wine glasses. We like white wine with a bit of ice....our wine stays cold, does not water down and no more drippy glasses. Highly recommend, so much so that I am buying the coffee mugs right now.
customer_reviews.author: PCB

customer_reviews.title: Would have gave 5 stars, but I am disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought couple Corkcicle cups before. They do hold the cold, but this specific I bought it not even a month ago and the outside started peeling for no reason. I dont have a dishwasher, therefore this cup gets wash by hand. It surprising since this has not happened to the other ones I own for the longest. I bought this because I wanted a new style, but I am very disappointed. Other than that, these cups are great.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Febus

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a counterfeit?????
customer_reviews.text: I've owned other Corksicles. The ones I own all have stayed aesthetically pleasing and function well. They also feel heavier. I bought this particular Corksicle for my husband and it felt lighter and more flimsy but we thought we give it a go. Well, within a couple of weeks the 'wood' design started chipping. Fortunately, Amazon took it back and we bought a Yeti for a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: mommyofboys

customer_reviews.title: Decently sealed, keeps my mine cold, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased one since I lost my first. It's a wonderful present especially for any wine lover. Keeps my hands warm and my drink cold, and it's relatively spill proof which is great for my bedside table. It's not meant to be totally spill proof, but it works fairly well. I actually like the print better in person than the images on Amazon, the colors are beautiful. I've bought other patterns for friends before and they love them too. Perfect for camping and any outdoor time.
customer_reviews.author: Spifftastic

customer_reviews.title: Don't by
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife about thirteen months ago. She pulled it out Memorial Day for the first time since last year. She noticed the pink coating on the outside is coming off. I was hoping you will honor this obvious defect with a replacement even though it’s been a little over the one year warranty period. Corkcicle basically told me I'm SOL. If you want a product that will last past its warranty period, don't buy from Corkcicle.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Femia

customer_reviews.title: Corkcicle
customer_reviews.text: Corkcicle has the best insulated products ever. I have the glasses which I use for coffee, ice tea, cold cold water all day long. I have the wine glasses which keep a red at a perfect temp and keep the white cold. Keeps your beer cold. Travels well. Top stays on and doesn't drip. The sides have a flat indentation which is perfect for hand grip. Also attractive. I've tried lots of others and these are the best .
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drink cold!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Sparkle Pixie Dust color because I love everything in lavender. Very pretty, sparkly color. Its price is on the stiffer side, but it's Corkcicle, meaning it keeps the cold drink cold for hours even with its plastic lid on. A little too thick for a smaller hand like mine, but the flat sides help.
customer_reviews.author: LalaRayshaun

customer_reviews.title: keeps my Wine cold poolside
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for a Napa get away so my sister and I could enjoy wine by the pool. I had another popular shark tank product that was glass, it wasn’t as effective in cooling nor as durable! We both throw our corkcicle in our bag every time we head to Calistoga. One of the best little splurges ever.
customer_reviews.author: Evil Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for gifts and they were both a hit. I was a little worried when I saw a couple reviews that said theirs came with a small dent, but I’m happy to say I didn’t have problems with either of mine. They were well protected in bubble wrap. I’d purchase again for myself or another gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Gunmetal has a VERY delicate surface.
customer_reviews.text: I have many of these cups and whoever's idea it was to put a sticker on the inside of the packaging directly touching the surface if the product should be fired... With such a smooth surface when I was trying to remove the sticker I scratched the crap out of it and I was being very careful.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Aurora style is nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: All in all, the quality of these corckicle mugs is great. I ordered a blue one and I loved it, leak-proof and keeps my drinks cold! But I ordered this Aurora one and it looks nothing like the picture! You can barely tell there's supposed to be mountains pictured. And of course I missed the return window by one day. Do not buy the fun patterns from corkcicle. I even ordered one directly from their website to see if mine was a defect? Nope, looked the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I wanted to use it for which is water on my nightstand. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in gold for myself and this one is for my husband. We keep them on our nightstand and use for water instead of wine. It keeps them cool and the lid keeps it dust free! I love the feel of them and they are very pretty. This one is a nice masculine color! I like bling so I got the shiny gold one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wine cup!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these for my birthday back in February and loved it so much that I bought a 2nd one. These keep the wine cold FOR HOURS!! The lid has a "slide back" to sip out of and it's perfect. They also fit in your hand perfectly as well. Anything CORKCICLE is a must have. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: this is a great gift for myself. i like to drink hot tea and was having to drink it quickly because it would get cold. but with this cup i can keep my tea hot for over 2 hours. it actually works and i like the design and color options. it also does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Corkcicle Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Anything made by Corkcicle is amaaaazing. The items that have the clear silicon lid aren’t leak proof ( just so everyone is clear on that) l knew that from previous purchases. That being said, you can use this for wine/ drinks with ice. There is no “sweating” of the drinks that have ice. Also the ice literally doesn’t melt for hours so multiple drinks are possible and don’t get watered down 😎
customer_reviews.author: Soupie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. However, I think mine had a little bit of a design flaw in that the lid fit the cup, but every time I take a sip, a little spills out onto my chin... I just took the lid off and it works perfectly. I love Corksicle and will probably buy another one. I just suspect it's a one time thing so I'm not too worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cup
customer_reviews.text: Love this glass. Perfect for outdoors, keeps cold drinks cold for hours and hot too. Ice doesn't melt quickly. It is easy to hold. Have recommended it to friends. It works for wine and alcoholic drinks too.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Soroko

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glass that feels like it’s meant to last!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are beautiful and sturdy. They do great at regulating the temperature of your drink. Whenever someone sees me drink from this glass I get several compliments. I love these glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Kazaar Ze’ev Cozzens

customer_reviews.title: Great drink glass.
customer_reviews.text: We like these wine glasses for cold drinks. They are handy for white wines or any kind of drink where you want to add ice. The ice stays in the drink without diluting the liquid for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Pavia

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a gift and it is so pretty! I love the colors (Aurora) so much that I am having a hard time not keeping it myself. I can't speak to the leak proof as of yet but overall quality appears very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have several Corkcicle products that I love but was disappointed with this. The design on the outside of the cup is like a sticker. Haven’t washed it yet but hopefully it doesn’t peel off.
customer_reviews.author: AngH

customer_reviews.title: Leaks around the seal--returning
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Pixie Dust color, which is a light lavender with glitter. It's a little less sparkly than the photo, but that's okay. The biggest issue is that when I tried to sip water from the cup, it seeped around the lid's seal and dripped down my chin. I planned to use this primarily for coffee, so that's really not going to work. I'll be returning this one for a replacement. If the next one works without leaking, I think it'll be a great cup! It kept my ice water cold overnight so the insulation is great.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Best Insulated Product Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Corkcicle tumblers and wine tumblers are the best insulated tumblers we have tried. Left on the counter overnight, the ice is still there next morning. The 12oz. Tumblers are very “cup holder friendly” in the car or on the boat. We have become Corckcicle-aholics. Wish they would make an ice bucket!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Best adult sippy cup
customer_reviews.text: Pretty glittery finish, nice grip, and spill proof top so I waste no wine out of clumsiness, general drunkenness, or cats. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lane

customer_reviews.title: Love this cup
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wine cup. The grip on the bottom allows me to set it down and not necessarily need a coaster. It keeps the wine cold and it's so sparkly
customer_reviews.author: jilllemaire4

customer_reviews.title: Damaged bottom
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed to receive a damaged product. The bottom silicone was slanted and the cup now waddles from side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Best Bridesmaid gift
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup! I used it as a bridesmaid gift and they loved the color, the functionality, and I was able to put a vynal sticker with their name on it. It was so useful as we celebrated all weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Corkcicle rocks
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Bought this as a gift for a friend. Took two shipments because the first one was dented due to poor packaging... but ... the end result was a happy friend.
customer_reviews.author: Web Geek

customer_reviews.title: Love it for Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for coffee because I am never ever to fully finish a cup because it gets cold. This lets me sip on my coffee in leisure because it keeps it nice and hot. Also their customer service is impeccable. My original order was slightly damaged and they immediately shipped me out a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Reinphall

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed with the cost of these plastic cups
customer_reviews.text: After paying the same price for metal Yeti cups, imagine my dismay when I received these colored plastic cups. Hot coffee stayed hot less than an hour, cold drinks stay cold longer.
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy for my 90 year old mother to hold and keeps her coffee hot for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for husband when he came out of hospital and was unsteady. It worked perfectly. Easy to hold and kept the coffee HOT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for coffee or cold drinks
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product except for one detail. The black anti-slip on the bottom of the item does not fit correctly. It is slightly raised on one side and this prevents the item from sitting flat and allows the item to wobble. Must be careful when reaching for the glass to prevent spilling over.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey JS

customer_reviews.title: Great wine glass.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife. She loves it. Comfortable to hold and keeps the wine cool.
customer_reviews.author: randybeall

customer_reviews.title: I love this little cup
customer_reviews.text: I love this little cup. I have the 24oz Tumbler but sometimes I just need something smaller, and here it is. It keeps my beverages cool and refreshing. And it looks good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Mugs Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These insulated mugs keep your coffee hot for at least 45 minutes. I challenge any other manufacturer to surpass this mark. Corkcicle is the absolute best period.
customer_reviews.author: David S Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love Corkcicle for personal use and gifts!!! There is no condensation on the outside ever!!! Keeps my drink cold for 24 hours!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Brand new and leaks - lid was graciously replaced but it still leaks when you drink from it
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Cup
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted this a few years ago and since then have bought over 10 to gift others. I use his cup every day for my hot tea. I also use in the summer for ice water, ice tea or cup of wine. I love the color assortments and highly suggest you get one for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Stern

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it cold (or hot)
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these mostly for wine. Manufacturer was very thoughtful to make opposing side slightly flatted to make gripping much easier, even for small hands. The purple color was more like a lavender color, and sparkles were not visible from a distance (but who cares about sparkles). These 12 oz. "glasses" really keep contents cold for a very long time. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Blountville, TN

customer_reviews.title: Just another cup.
customer_reviews.text: The vessel is good and reliable to keep a drink either cold or hot. Comfortable to hold. Durable and easy care. Biggest negative is the plastic lid with sliding closer. Closer fastens to lid and is not durable and the two (2) small plastic guides will most likely break with repeated removal to clean. Will swap out with a yeti lid using a magnet to attach to closer. Overall corkcicle is average but not must have for me.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: This cup is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This cup is honestly beautiful. It super comfy to hold. It's amazing how it cold it keeps our drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Wood look- top cup! Just a big fan of Corkcicle !!! Well done ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sansche

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small coffee
customer_reviews.text: Fits into car cup holder, not to bottom, but a sturdy hold. Since the cup is short, that allows me to grip it to pick it up out of cat cup holder. There are small slightly flattened sides to allow for a solid hold or grip. Very nice looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want more!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups! I got one as a gift for a friend, as well as purchasing one for myself, so we could drink wine on the beach. The cups kept our wine cold and didn't leak on us in our chairs. I may want five more!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Faust

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cup, perfect the the avid wine drinker. Corkcircle makes great products, this is the second item I’ve purchased from them. Not 100% leak proof, but good enough. Don’t hold it upside down and you’ll be fine. Vibrant color.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bryant

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order. it is very beautiful and I am looking forward to using it. However, for the price you are charging MAKE IT IN THE U.S. I will be buying products made in the U.S. (or at least made somewhere other than China), or not buy at all.
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love these stainless steel wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these stainless steel wine glasses. The colors are really pretty and they are well made. I love having the no spill lid included with kids and dogs around. They keep my wine cool for a long time. Perfect for summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: And not breakable. I have had cases of wine glasses broken. Sometimes breaking my heart. No more iris the perfect gift. Everyone has loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Clauson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for having chilled wine in the sun or on the couch
customer_reviews.text: I like the lid and insulation very much. Didn't know I was painted with wood look, and was expecting a veneer or laminated wood finish.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about this insulated cup? My gf loves it since it has the nice flats on the sides to make it easier to hold on to, keeps her chilled white wine cold, and has a nice rubber bottom, and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: S Rock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cup! It's a spill proof meaning if it topples over it will not spill your drink out. It's not leak proof and I do not recommend filling it and placing in a bookbag. You will be in for a soggy surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lid is not leak proof
customer_reviews.text: this is definitely not leak proof. the slightest jostle and liquid comes out from the lid, even if it’s locked closed. I’m a commuter so this is such an impractical toteable mug/cup. i’ll keep it at my desk because it’s cute, but that’s it. if I would have known it was going to leak this bad I wouldn’t have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana R Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time ordering equally as happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the metallic black for a gift - I liked it better than the stainless steel one's I have. They were well rec'd! These are great if you have a boat, pool area, fire pit worried about glass breaking - we use them daily!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandbox17

customer_reviews.title: Better Rim! Beautiful Color!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the thinner rim. More like a wine glass. Some of the other tumblers out there have a thicker rim which can lead to dribbles. And I like that it is easier to hold. Yay! I love my glossy turquoise color too!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, works well  I like it
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect for a gin and tonic as well as wine .and the gin is not diluted by melting ice . However the rim gun metal has peeled off but I like the product enough to buy 2 more as I don't think I have consumed any of the laminate and it has been sterilized by the alcohol .
customer_reviews.author: gibson h

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift and she loves it and uses it a the time
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Howington

customer_reviews.title: A Great Cup for Any Drink
customer_reviews.text: I've used my Corkcicle 12oz cup for coffee, hot tea, milk, and iced tea. Both hot and cold drinks remain hot or cold. Good insulation! The 12oz is "not too little...not too big" amount of any beverage!
customer_reviews.author: Alan G Raughton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love corkcicle. Great product, floats if you drop it, keeps everything cold forever, awesome look.. the only reason I give it 4 stars is because it looks matte in the photos but, it's a very shiny glossy exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great cup, good looking abc functional
customer_reviews.text: I love these abc had several in another color but I love this color I find myself reaching for them first because they are so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Subtle sparkles
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these tumblers, just wish the sparkle was more pronounced. It looks more shiny then sparkly and if I were to purchase again I’d just go with the flat color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the shimmer
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! Keeps drinks insulated perfectly! Perfect for use by the pool or on the go. Only downside it doesn’t fit in any car cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Bugz

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite cup
customer_reviews.text: We love these ordered another and makes a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: What can you say when this is requested it must be awesome. It's been a couple of months now and no complaints from the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: M. Monical

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great cup, helps keep drinks cold. Got one as a gift and gave one as a gift and both of us are happy :-)
customer_reviews.author: KMJ

customer_reviews.title: It keeps your beverage at the perfect temperature.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, easy to hold & carry & KEEPS THINGS COLD!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pool Day
customer_reviews.text: This is great for when you are lounging by the pool and can't bring your glass on the deck. Keep cold drinks cold for a very long time and hot drinks piping hot all day
customer_reviews.author: Kent Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for coffee
customer_reviews.text: I like this for both keeping coffee warm (1 hour - but I don't use the lid) and water cold (2 hrs - again w/o lid). Pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: P Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for wine and those who have Parkinson's
customer_reviews.text: It's great for white wine but I ended up giving it to my mom who is suffering from Parkinson's. Really helps her be able to drink but not spill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loved it.
customer_reviews.text: The Corkcicle was a gift to my sister-in-law. We go out on boats and have fun. All the women had Corkcicles for their wine. Sis in law did not. Now she does. She was thrilled when she got her own. All the womrn love theirs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Keeps drinks cold for a long time! Looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Anna McKie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Cute and functional. Keeps my coffee hot for a long time; keeps my wine cold! perfect cup
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cup
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful cup, but it came to me scuff and it is a eye sore to me. I am going to see if I can send it back and get a different one because I really love this cup.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Love this wine tumbler!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wine tumbler after recommendation by my daughter. Love the color and good quality. Wonderful for outdoors b/c of lid to keep bugs out. Keeps chilled wine cold.
customer_reviews.author: Holly McDorman

customer_reviews.title: Great poolside use!
customer_reviews.text: Love using these poolside! No worries about broken glass and they hold the temperature of the liquid well. Does not distort the taste of wine with the types I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: They keep wine very nice and cold!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for wine. They do not influence the flavor and they keep my summer whites very cold!
customer_reviews.author: TM mills

customer_reviews.title: Best insulated wine glass we have found
customer_reviews.text: Really hits the spot for keeping wine at the right temp. Durable and does not tip. Bought a couple and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Morley

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get what i paid for.
customer_reviews.text: The seems were not put together well. If I am spending 25 bucks on a cup i want the seems to be even. This is my third corkcicle cup the other two were perfect..but i did order them straight from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Shontrell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wine glass! The cup is designed to easily be held. The colors are very vibrant and no leaking seen. Will be purchasing again (I would love to see even more colors :-D)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color and convenient for drinking during hot days. The slide opening doesn't stay closed/opened, so it's easy to spill. Kept drink cold!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: True to description
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE. Gifted to my mother inlaw and she can't stop talking about it. Really sturdy keeps hot items hot, cold cold. Just all around great
customer_reviews.author: Yessica

customer_reviews.title: I'm keeping the product because its still good, and the lid will protect against bugs
customer_reviews.text: The lid leaks. It just does. When you tip it up to drink fluid dribbles out. I'm keeping the product because its still good, and the lid will protect against bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping wine cold
customer_reviews.text: The woodgrain and the pearl color are both very cute. My husband and I use them to keep our wine cold on hot summer nights in the backyard. They are very effective and having the lid is great!
customer_reviews.author: LawyerLady

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: i love my corksickle stemless glass. i bought it because i have a corksickle bottle that i take everywhere. the only thing i don't love about it is it's not bigger. my fault, tho.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Lane

customer_reviews.title: Keeps iced drinks cold for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and perfect size for a cocktail. No messy condensation either. The wood grain is really nice looking. No need for the plastic top. Well packed.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep your wine cold or your coffee or tea hot!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I bought two as gifts, one for my friend for Christmas, and another for my sister for her birthday. They both seem to love them. Now I need to get one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: Lid issues
customer_reviews.text: Be careful because when you close the lid it spits back at you . I learned this the hard way with red wine
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Northern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I refuse to drink from anything else. These products are amazing! Coffee stays warm, drinks stay cold. They look good and sleek. Got the stemless wine glasses with a lid (very convenient) and the champagne flutes. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Atoromatos
